title: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
location: Knowledge park, Greater Noida, UP, India
points: Completed with a strong focus on practical development. Built a full-featured eCommerce website as a final year project.
Technoloy used React, Express, and MySQL—including user authentication, product listings, shopping cart, and order management.

title: Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA)
points: Developed an Attendance Management System as a final year project.
Technology used PHP and PgAdmin (PostgreSQL) attendance tracking and generating detailed reports for students and faculty.
